location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:151 x 193 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘34’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of a street in Baghdad. At left a large three-storey brick building with projecting mashrabiyyas and a roof-terrace takes up most of the scene. At right a brick building extends into the background; gutters extend from the upper walls. Several figures are visible, including one man in dark outer robes right of centre.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'Street in Bagdad.'
